Iâ€™ve heard Honda Civicâ€™s are reliable and have great tuning potential. Donâ€™t know the exact specs for LX but my Si is fun to drive with 197hp and 139 lb-ft of torque (these are just numbers and I want to get an actual dyno rest done to verify them).

It has 74k miles on it. I bought it through a dealership and they pretty much took care of all the fluids. I'd love to do something myself but having no garage is restricting me to get my hands dirty. That's another concern of mine living in an apartment complex. I bought the car thinking I'd get to work on it and understand the machine better but didn't think the whole process through.
